caption: Security Incident
description: Security Incident events report the creation, update, or closure of incidents as a result of detections and/or analytics.
name: security_incident

attacks.description: An array of attacks associated with the incident.

cis_csc.description: The recommended mitigations to take in order to resolve the incident.

comment.description: Additional user supplied details for updating or closing the incident.

desc.description: The short description of the incident.

end_time.description: The time of the most recent event included in the incident.

start_time.description: The time of the least recent event included in the incident.

user.description: The creator of the rule that triggered the incident, or the user associated with an incident update or closure.
